scenario.name: spit_call
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field0]@[field1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport User-Agent: SIPp From: MM_07-O <sip:MM_07-O@ibk.tuwien.ac.at:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: [field0] <sip:[field1]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: SPIT Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,NOTIFY,REFER,MESSAGE Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 4 2 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000/1 a=sendonly m=video [media_port+2] RTP/AVP 106 a=sendonly a=rtpmap:106 h263-1998/90000

ACK sip:[$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 To: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] From: MM_07-O <sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Subject: SPIT Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Route: <sip:128.131.88.77;lr=on> To: "[field0]"<sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] From: "MM_07-O"<sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: <sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,NOTIFY,REFER,MESSAGE Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] To: "[field0]"<sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] From: "MM_07-O"<sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: <sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 4 2 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000/1 a=sendonly m=video [media_port+2] RTP/AVP 106 a=sendonly a=rtpmap:106 h263-1998/90000
